A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst Star Wars Movie and the beginning of the end of star wars the way we knew it. I never post reviews on movies but wanted to leave my mark on this film as I've been waiting years to finally see the end of the skywalker story unfold. I saw the film twice and feel completely as tho everything that made star wars special is now going to be sewed by the persons in control of the star wars universe.
